page.title: 10HEALTH RAFFORD AREA
page.content: Nearly all the people we interviewed use the facility of the Forres Health Centre when they are ill.Not many people go for a yearly check-up and even less go for o monthly check-up. We found that 20% of the people wear contact lenses and only 3% wear a hearing aid.Nearly every adult drink alcohol and only half the people smoke.There are 15 people out of 137 who require pills daily and 50 out of 137 whohave had an operation.There are roughly 35 out of 137 people who eat health foods.Hardly anybody out of the 137 have asthma and out of the 137 only one person is disabled.In all the people we interviewed nobody had anything serious like cancer or have had heart attacks.
